unnormalised: Jaivik Kheti: Apeak Mul Re-go Ruthi-ruaar! Dosto!
normalised: Kudrat Kheti: Abonak Juri Auriye Ruwar, Hatere!

unnormalised: Hai Kisan Hatiako! Khemikal-ko jaked doho ar apeak khetikam do pure-ge Jaivik-te benao layak uihar-le-pe? Hoho, sidha din ka-na, miti! Jaivik kheti do, mul re-ge, hapramko chelek khetikam-a-kan tahekan, unak katha ka-na – Dharti-gogak sanam akore sapraho, banka uihar. Urea khaad badla guru-lundi uihar, ar Dr. Sharma ge hamesha laha-i kitnasak badla nim tel.
normalised: Helo Kisan Bandhu ko! Rasaynik dawai ko bona dadi kete pura kudrat kheti te calak laite nonka mone hoho-ak tabona? Acha, mone-o hoba kana, bochho! Kudrat kheti do, mul rup te, abonak budha hadam ko do jemonko kheti kana – kudrat do bona saote kamiyak, bona birudh te do bang. Urea badol te gai gundri chinta-ak, Docter Sharma ja jemon rimbil keeta-nasak dawai ko lahai ak, onko badol te neem tel re do.

unnormalised: Ena do sanam Naa-harsing hasa benao katha ka-na. Ena ge mul katha, miti? Naa-harsing hasa mane Naa-harsing dar-patra, ar ena do Naa-harsing hor-ko jom-a-ko! Nonka kam-ko katha-o ka-na chelek khet re phal bodol-bodol roi – miti, chinabadam tahenge bajra roi – hasak poshan tatva doho ar kida-patana-ko hileng. Inkunge Kompost khaad benao – khetak usra chaba do apeak khet layak bonga sona-te bodol. Hasak upar-re Jaivik mulching-te doho-a-te-ge dak doho-a ar tola haak do kam-ti-a-ko. Uihar-pe, chuan dare kam-tarak dak-a-te hileng ar dandar-hasak-a-te tola haak hileng!
normalised: Sabin do basa hasa do bona banava leka do. Ondo mul auri kana, banga? Basa hasa do basa birid gidra, jaha do basa hor ko ja-onko jo-o ko! Kheti re fasal badlao do jemon, jemon badam dade auriye bajra – hasa re posak tattav ko jaiban ko do ucha rakab ar rimbil ko do anja-o. Ondo khad banaw do – kheti re sabin kachra ko do a-wak khet re setem sonam te badla-o. Hasare kudrat mulching te dhaka-o do dak do dadiye rakab ar hulu ko do bonga a-o. Chinta-ak, kuyi te kam trips ar kam hadam kam hulu bonga!

unnormalised: Rs. 5000/acre khemikal khaad kharchako hileng-pe. Jaivik kheti do, mul re, miti muskil kam leka nuhel-a-pe, menkhan marang din-re do kam khaam ar dharti-gogak layak adi bes ge. Inkunge, Jaivik-te jaha phal upaj-a-pe ena do bajar re marang daam milao-a-pe. Uihar-pe – "Jaivik Kheti, Ucch Dam!" Apeak Chandni Chowk ren marang boko-batiako do apeak chenikal-hileng tamatar layak baha-baha-i-ko!
normalised: Onko hilinj-ak, ek acre re moR hazar taka kharcha rasaynik khad ko te. Kudrat kheti do, pahil do hasa hoba leka gona lagav ak, inkan dher din re ona do kam paisa ar bohot basa paryavaran laite. Ar, kudrat rup te ru-ak jinish ko do bazar re dher paisa giye. Ona do chinta-ak – "Jaivik Kheti, Ucch Dam!" A-wak Chandni Chowk re masim ko do a-wak rasaynik-free tamatar ko laiteko jhagda-o!

unnormalised: Han, in do in nela-a ape chet uihar-a-pe: "Phal! Phal layak chet?" Enak katha ka-na, mul re, kamti nuhel-a-pe. Menkhan, ar ena do miti marang menkhan, hasa do din-ka-din Naa-harsing ge. Chandu sal tahenge, Vidarbha ren kuchh khet-ko re do samani ka dooh bes ge upaj milao-a-ko, saamanya khetikam sanam! Inkunge, phal do adi swad ge nuhel-a – jaha koi-ge Ratnagiri ren sacha Jaivik ambu jom keda unko-ge kudam-pe.
normalised: Hore, ing do ing badae kana chinka-o kana: "Fasal! Fasal do chika kana?" Onka do sach kana, pahil do kamti hoba leka gona. Inkan, ar ona do ganna inkan, hasa do din din te dher basa-o. Bar pe serma dade, Vidarbha re do kichu kheti ko do fasal giye samanya kheti bonam ko te tuluj, inkan dher basa! Ar, ona jinish do dher basa rasi-o – Ratnagiri re do pura kudrat rup te ru-ak aamba jaho je-ako hako do onko do guti-ak.

unnormalised: Sarkar ge adi jabar-jasti Jaivik khetikam laha-i. Yojana-ko ka-na jaha re paisa milao-a-ge ar sikhna-o karjam, chelek Indian Agricultural Research Institute (IARI) leka sanstha-ko khon. Unko do pranaman patra-ko ho doho-a, chelek NPOP (National Programme for Organic Production), jaha do apeak phal do sarkar patak "Jaivik" leka akrin-te gohon-a-pe.
normalised: Sarkar do bohhot zor te lahai ak, kudrat kheti do. Ona re do yojana ko mena, subsidy ar training program ko Indian Agricultural Research Institute (I A R I) nonka sansthan ko te. Onko do certification ko mena, jemon N P O P (National Programme for Organic Production), jaha do a-wak jinish do sarkari rup te "organic" leka do bika-o bona.

unnormalised: Kulhi-kulhi? Apeak ilaaka ren itar Jaivik khetia-ko sanam go-pasaoti katha-go. Mit Krishi Vigyan Kendra re sen-pe. Huding jaga re parkha-o, miti, 500 sq ft re, pura khet bodol hileng-te hileng. Ena do karam-kana, banka daura-o.
normalised: Dahaiye huru-a-ak? A-wak ilaqa re do adar kudrat kheti-a ko saote katha-ak. Krishi Vigyan Kendra re do calak. Kichu chhot bagean re experiment-ak, jemon paanch so square feet, a-wak pura kheti do badla-o pahil re. Ona do ek saphala kana, race do bang.

unnormalised: To, uihar-pe. Apeak mul re-go ruthi-ruaar, Naa-harsing jom-ko roi, ar dharti do jaha leka nuhel-len tahekan unak dooh bes ge doho-ato. Jai Kisan! Bharat disom do Jaivik phal-te banga-o-a-bo!
normalised: Nonka do, chinta-ak. Abonak juri auriye ruwar, basa jom jinish do ru-ak, ar ona muluk do abon je-ako sapdak do, ondo dher basa bona adi. Jai Kisan! Abon do Bharat do kudrat fasal re ek muluk te bona banava.
